data.title: The Official Website of the Goodguys Rod & Custom Association
data.meta_description: Goodguys Rod & Custom Association is the world’s largest hot rodding association with over 70,000 active members worldwide. Goodguys events feature thousands of candy colored hot rods and customs, tricked out trucks, mighty muscle cars and regal classics sprawled throughout venues such as lush fairgrounds, super speedways and large outdoor stadiums.
data.text:
It's time to tune up the engines and shine up your rides up because the Goodguys 2024 season officially kicks off this March with 15 events nationwide.

Cruisin’, awards, hanging, autocross racing, nitro thunderfests, burnout competitions, fireworks, live music, cold beverages - its hot rodding at it’s finest and we’d love for you to join us at America's Favorite Car Show.

You’re a community of hot rodders trekking across this nation proudly cruising your creations from town to town, from event to event.

We’re your host to the best Hot Rod events in world. National Events, Get-Togethers, Road Tours, Shop Tours, AutoCross Competitions, Vintage Drag Races and Nitro Thunderfests.

Together we are the hot rod lifestyle.

40 years, 700 events, over a million miles driven and we’re still rolling

You built it. You adopted it. You revived it. You Drive it.

We are a rare community, a outwardly passionate group and we love a good time on four wheels. Get out to an event, hop on a cruise, sport the Goodguys brand and never look back.

We got you covered with event discounts, parts discounts, travel discounts, merchandise discounts. The value of a Goodguys membership is built in.

Goodguys members know the benefits. How passionate are you?
